name: GUP
description:
Nothing but the remnants of a war-torn world that once housed bird and fish-kind in peace. 

Overtaken by the avian armada and their oppressive bird mechs, the last of fish-kind swore one last bitter farewell. 

As the world is destroyed by a flood, one last fish prepares to make it through the blockade before either catastrophe or vengeance find them.
